text: was a professional baseball player from Japan. He played for Chiba Lotte Marines in the Japan Pacific League and the Yakult Swallows in the Japan Central League. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball catchers Category:Lotte Orions players Category:Chiba Lotte Marines players Category:Yakult Swallows players
title: Susumu Aoyagi
